title: Clinton camp demands citizens cooperating for the Master Plan.
subtitle: Bill Evie, former head of the National Arts Fund, says that the leaked e-mail to Clinton's deputy John Bodista did not reveal a "main plan" to maintain political power through "an ignorant and compliant citizen."
author: David Emery
vclaim: A leaked e-mail from the former National Fund of Art Chief Bill Ivy to the Clinton campaign manager John Bodista revealed a democratic master plan.
